overview:
Seasoned Senior Executive with expertise in:

  • Discovering new markets
  • Defining products and driving development
  • Guiding Sales and Marketing to exploit opportunity
  • Providing due diligence
  • Assessing financial statements toward revenue enhancement Specialties

Discovering opportunities and driving growth, Systems architecture, Engineering management, Embedded systems, Assisting and assessing Start-ups. Selling to senior level management.

I invest in, start, and run high technology companies, the latest, Armvida. Also founded Real Life Logic, an engineering and business services company that helps young companies and PE, VC, Angels with Due Diligence/mgmt team/tech. risk assessment.
